records.location_text_raw: Text removed - Operational Area, Evros, Greece
records.context_note: A serious incident occurred in the Evros region, Greece, on April 16, 2022. According to local media, Turkish military helped traffickers smuggle migrants into Greece. When boats approached the Greek shore, Text removed - Reporting Tools turned on powerful lenses. Turkish army/police fired at the boats to prevent return, killing one woman and injuring others. The incident is under investigation.
records.evidence_quote: According to local media there was a serious incident in Text removed - Operational Area in which a woman irregular migrant lost her life. Specifically, Turkish military were helping traffickers to smuggle illegal immigrants into Greece in two boats. But when the boats started approaching to the Greek shore, there was an ambush of Text removed - Reporting Tools in the area, who, as is their custom in these cases, turned on powerful lenses to prevent the irregular migrants from reaching Greek shore. Seeing this situation, the Turkish army/police, in order not to allow the smugglers with the migrants to return back, fired at the boats. As a result, a woman was killed and there are also injured.

records.location_details: 46 Syrian refugees on islet inside the river Evros, without the necessary supplies, for a period which may exceed five days. Imminent risk to life, including for children and persons facing medical needs.
records.context_note: UNHCR and Greek Council for Refugees (GCR) communicate about 46 Syrian refugees on an islet in the Evros River for over five days without supplies. They highlight an ECtHR decision and imminent risk to life, including for children and those with medical needs, urging immediate identification and rescue.
records.evidence_quote: Following the below communications by the Greek Council for Refugees regarding the presence of 46 Syrian refugees on an islet within the Evros river, without the necessary supplies, for a period which may exceed five days, following the relevant decision of the ECtHR, and given the possibly imminent risk to life, including for children and persons facing medical needs, we kindly ask for your actions as to the identification and safe rescue of the said group of people.

records.evidence_quote: Κατόπιν επικοινωνίας μας προ ολίγων λεπτών με την ομάδα των 46 Σύρων προσφύγων που βρίσκονται ακόμη στη νησίδα, για τους οποίους έχει εκδοθεί η συνημμένη απόφαση του ΕΔΔΑ, η οποία σας έχει ήδη σταλεί από χθες, σας ενημερώνουμε ότι, όπως μας μεταφέρουν οι ίδιοι, η στάθμη του νερού ανεβαίνει και κινδυνεύουν. Με βάση τα στοιχεία που μας έχουν στείλει ως προς την τοποθεσία τους και είναι στην κατοχή σας η νησίδα εμφαίνεται στον χάρτη στην συμβολή του παραπόταμου ΕΡΥΘΡΟΠΟΤΑΜΟΣ και του Έβρου.

records.location_details: Two groups of 37 and 46 Syrian refugees, respectively, on islets in Evros, including infants, small children, and sick people, in very precarious conditions for many days.

possible_violations.violation_name: Non-refoulement / Right to life / Right to humane treatment

records.context_note: GCR informs about two groups of 37 and 46 Syrian refugees on islets in the Evros River, including infants, small children, and sick people, in very precarious conditions for many days. The ECtHR has instructed the Greek Government not to remove them and to provide food, water, shelter, and medical care. GCR requests information on compliance, noting that the Integrated Border Management Center (KODISME) Orestiada has not yet located them.
records.evidence_quote: Σε συνέχεια των συνημμένων παρέμβασεών μας (...) για την υπαγωγή σε διαδικασία υποδοχής και ταυτοποίησης δύο ομάδων 37 και 46 Σύρων προσφύγων, αντίστοιχα, σε νησίδες στον Έβρο, σας ενημερώνουμε ότι το Ευρωπαϊκό Δικαστήριο για τα Δικαιώματα του Ανθρώπου υποδεικνύει στην Ελληνική Κυβέρνηση τη μη απομάκρυνσή τους από τη χώρα και την παροχή σε αυτούς τροφής, νερού, προσωρινής διαμονής και κατάλληλης ιατρικής φροντίδας (οράτε συνημμένες αποφάσεις του ΕΔΔΑ).

records.evidence_quote: Παρακαλώ βρείτε συνημμένη ορθή επανάληψη του υπ' αριθμ 150/18-4-2022 εγγράφου του Ελληνικού Συμβουλίου για τους Πρόσφυγες με διορθωμένα στοιχεία κατόπιν νέας επικοινωνίας μας με τους ίδιους τους Σύρους πρόσφυγες (ως προς τον αριθμό, τα ονόματα και ημερομηνίες γέννησης και την εθνικότητά τους). records.context_note: An update on 37 refugees stranded on an island in the Evros River. One woman is in severe medical condition, needing dialysis (not received for 8 days). Traumatized children are present. The group is asking for asylum and urgent help. Greek authorities were informed, but an officer was reportedly unaware of the distress.
records.evidence_quote: Concerning the stranded group of 37 refugees in Evros river, the situation at 03:23 CET is as follows: ... One woman is reportedly in severe medical condition and needs immediate medical help. ... There are reportedly traumatised children among them who have been trapped for long time exposed to the bad weather. ... They are reportedly in need of protection and asked for asylum. ... One woman of the group would need Dialysis according to the people and she allegedly did not have Dialysis for 8 days now.
